items.title: Ask HN: How Many Programmers Are Now Using AI Agents in Their Work?
items.summary:
Title: How Many Programmers Are Now Using AI Agents and Other Tools in Their Work? Content:  
AI-powered programming is becoming increasingly popular, and I'm curious how many people have already started using AI agents in their actual work (usage level: purely for assistance, completely relay on agent). Among those already using them, how many have company support, and how many are using them at their own expense? Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=47177492 Points: 1 # Comments: 0
